name: Mini Soft Pinch Liquid Blush
about: What it is:Weightless, long-lasting liquid blush with up to 12-hour wear. Blends and builds beautifully for a soft, healthy flush in matte or dewy finishes...Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also cruelty-free and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This blush creates a pinch-perfect flush using this featherweight formula infused with long-lasting pigments that last all day. Available in matte or dewy finishes, this liquid blush blends beautifully to create soft, buildable color with a natural second-skin finish.
ingredients: Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Hydrogenated Poly(C6-14 Olefin), Mica, Octyldodecanol, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Isododecane, 1,2-Hexanediol, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Propylene Carbonate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Aluminum Hydroxide, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Gardenia Florida Fruit Extract, Nelumbo Nucifera (Sacred Lotus) Flower Extract, Nymphaea Odorata Root Extract. [+/- May Contain/Peut Contenir: Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Yellow 6 Lake (CI 15985), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090)].
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Gently remove excess product from applicator..-Use the doe-foot applicator and place one or two dots on each cheek..-Use fingertips and gently pat into skin for a seamless finish.

reviews.review_title: Never going back to powdered blush.
reviews.review_text: After using powder blush my entire life, I am never going back. This little bit of product goes a long way. Just a dab on each cheek and blend in with the complimenting Selena brush, and youu2019re looking radiant. Highly recommend you give it a try.
I use this to bronze up my skin (I am fair). The formula is long-lasting.. even after a full day of being a teacher at a daycare it looks beautiful on my skin. Well done Selenerrrr

reviews.review_title: Amazing product, not so nice applicator
reviews.review_text: Very nice shade and easy to blend. I only leavs 4 stars because I do not like the applicator on the mini size. I have the blush in different colour in the big size and I can say that the big sizeu2019s applicator is much softer and has a nicer feel to the skin. The miniu2019s applicator is rather hard and I feel like Iu2019m poking my cheeks with it. I wish they kept the same applicator.
perfect little blush that adds a little bit of color, would recommend and last a long time just really expensive. elf is a good dupe but rare beauty is decent

reviews.review_title: Wish I Bought Into The Hype Sooner
reviews.review_text: I get the craze around these blushes now. I held off on trying them for so long but they are amazing. They have pigment but itu2019s not as intense as I thought it was going to be watching all the reviewsu2026maybe they were just deeper shades people were trying. They are super easy to use, blend very easily, you donu2019t need a lot of product, the finish is beautiful and they last all day. Basically all you can ask for in a blush! Plus theyu2019re reasonably priced for how good they are. The shade virtue is gorgeous! Itu2019s like the perfect summer u201cI was just in the sun all dayu201d shade. I will be using it all summoner long!
Really pretty and long lasting bought over 4 months ago and still have over 3/4 left but itu2019s hard to blend sometimes

I love this product! This was my first time buying from the brand and I wanted to try out the blush before I bought a full size and I love it! Itu2019s easy to blend out, itu2019s lightweight and has a beautiful glowy finish! Buy this!

the shade is a little bit dark on my skin tone (thatu2019s my own fault) but to try out different colours this size is perfect!
